channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best-ever IHG card offers: Earn up to 200,000 bonus points
item.description: If you have upcoming travel to any of IHGâ€™s brands, a IHG cobranded card can save you hundreds of dollars every year. Here are the details.

item.title: How to pick the right travel credit card for you
item.description: Find the best travel credit card by comparing rewards, perks and fees to match your spending habits and travel goals.

item.title: Celebrating 1 year of partnership: The coolest SLH hotels you can book with Hilton Honors points
item.description: From France to Bali, these are the best Small Luxury Hotels of the World properties you can book using Hilton Honors points.

item.title: What you need to know about Visa Signature card benefits
item.description: What is a Visa Signature card? This guide will walk you through what you need to know about the Visa card network's perks to maximize its benefits.

item.title: The dreaded SSSS boarding pass: What you need to know about TSA's enhanced screening tag
